channel.title: Photography on Made By Nathan
channel.description: Recent content in Photography on Made By Nathan

item.title: Scanning lots of photos at once with GIMP on Ubuntu Linux
item.description: I needed a way to scan a lot of photos at once. I was going to write a GIMP plugin to extract out multiple images from a single scanned image of 3 or 4 photos, and then rotate them automatically. But as always, someone had already beat me to it :) See this forum on GimpTalk for the original script. (The only problem I had is that the Deskew plugin for GIMP is located on a website whose server seems to be permanently offline.
